name: [EN] Sheepstick
description:
Short game about little girl, who shepherds a flock of sheep.

It's made for Stepicon Unity Jam in 48 hours by 5 people and got we got the first place with it: https://jam.stepico.com/

Buy young sheeps, defend them from wolfs, feed them, and sell grown up ones.

Your character can switch weapons beetween seeds and stones. Use seeds to plant it and feed wsheeps with carrots this way. Use stones or stick strikes to kick wolfs away.

Buy your own ranch to win. It costs 1000 gold.
